instruction: Describe the emotions these lines evoke.
input: "The sun is setting in an orange haze, so beautiful yet so distant"
output: The lines evoke a sense of longing and sadness as the sun sets. The orange haze of the sunset implies a sense of endearment and nostalgia, an appreciation for a beautiful moment, yet at the same time creates a feeling of being distant from it, unable to completely take it in. The mellowness of the imagery encourages contemplation, a desire to sit and enjoy the view but also a sense of sadness that it will eventually be gone.
